Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Trump wrote personal checks to those in need, without any evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence provided to support the claim that Trump wrote personal checks or brought his personal accountant to Tennessee.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Trump flew into the area in a helicopter to avoid traffic problems in the city, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there were no reports of Trump writing checks to anyone during his visit.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that Trump visited Tennessee to see the damage done by tornadoes and expressed his support for the affected communities, but there is no evidence to support the claim of writing personal checks.
